snippet.title: Promise Mascot Agency - Character REVEAL Trailer | FGS LIVE FROM GDC
snippet.description:
Promise Mascot Agency is a mind-bending open world narrative adventure where players get to explore a cursed Japanese town. In this new character trailer shown at FGS Live From GDC, it's revealed that Lady Love Dies from the game Paradise Killer will make a cameo in the Promise Mascot Killer, which comes to PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X and Series S, and PC on April 10th.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #gdc #promisemascotagency

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
